arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 2-2 Manchester City: Eric Dier secures late draw for Monégasques after Erling Haaland brace
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Matchday 2, 01/10/25 AS Monaco salvaged a late draw against Manchester City, thanks to an Eric Dier penalty, and despite an Erling Haaland brace at the Stade…

arts.ttl: Furious Erling Haaland insists Man City were 'not good enough' after his first-half brace went to waste in Monaco - as frustrated star gives hilariously-blunt verdict on Eric Dier's late penalty
arts.sum: Eric Dier scored a controversial 90th-minute equaliser from the penalty spot, a decision that left Pep Guardiola seething after Nico Gonzalez's high boot had caught the ex-Tottenham defender.

arts.ttl: Man City defending 'lazy & stupid' for late Monaco penalty
arts.sum: Champions League pundit Nicky Butt says Monaco's late penalty against Manchester City was a result of "lazy defending" from the 2023 Champions, as they had to settle for a draw.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola has ‘nothing to say’ about Monaco’s late penalty against Man City
arts.sum: Former Tottenham defender Eric Dier scored from the spot in the 90th minute.

arts.ttl: Wasteful Man City held by Monaco after controversial late penalty
arts.sum: Manchester City's awayday blues haunted them again as Monaco snatched a late 2-2 draw in their Champions League league phase clash through Eric Dier's controversial late penalty.

arts.ttl: Champions League live updates: Barcelona-PSG, Monaco-Man City
arts.sum: The first day of Matchday 2 of the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League season is here, with matches such as Barcelona-PSG and Monaco-Man City.

arts.ttl: Barcelona v PSG, Monaco v Manchester City and more: Champions League and Championship – live
arts.sum: Updates from the Champions League and Championship Live scores | Read Football Daily | Mail Michael Hello world! Who says you can’t have a clockwatch that straddles both Europe’s finest club competition … and the Champions League. Boom, boom! We’ll be here all night (or around 11pm BST) with that sort of hollow humour. Come on in, the water is lukewarm. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Why isn't Paul Pogba playing against Man City?
arts.sum: The 32-year-old has yet to make his debut for his new Ligue 1 club, having not played a competitive game in two years due to his doping ban. Monaco midfielder Paul Pogba will not feature in Wednesday's Champions League clash with Manchester City .

arts.ttl: How to Watch Monaco vs. Man City on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Man City are aiming to make it two wins from two at the start of their Champions League campaign.

arts.ttl: Manchester City predicted XI v Monaco: Rodri to return?
arts.sum: Rodri missed Manchester City’s win over Burnley over the weekend, however, he could make his return against AS Monaco on Wednesday night. Pep Guardiola revealed during the pre-match press conference…
